'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. It is located on the [[Ofecchia Channel]], in the northeastern-most corner of the world map, at the coordinates 4° 58' S, 67° 37' E.

==Points of interest==
A very small cave and "home" of [[Sigilmaster Auranic]], a Vailian wizard commanding a number of powerful sigils. She is one of the four [[Mega Boss Battles|mega bosses]].

==Trivia==
* The internal location is called "Cave".
* This is actually a subsection of [[Cignath Mór]], with the viewport restricted to the bottom left section.
title: Briny Grotto
